name: Unlit Demo
description:
One lady and one cat, trying to get out of a locked house with only a lantern and their wits to guide them.

This is a demo of the full-in-early-development puzzle/adventure game. This game is made of unique content (3D assets, original soundtrack, even 100% original code) made especially for this project.

Collect items, solve puzzles, ignore the annoying cat, and find your way out of the mansion!
